items.standFirst: PREMIER League leaders Chelsea were held to a 1-1 draw by Southampton, but retained their lead at the top after Manchester City also dropped points. items.standFirst: INDIAN firebrand Virat Kohli blasted his third Test century of the summer at the MCG before declaring he respected only some of his Australian opponents.

items.standFirst: TAYLOR Swift has thrown herself a star-studded birthday party to mark her 25th. Pictures from inside her million-dollar apartment reveal what went down.
